articles.author: Agency Report
articles.title: EPL, BBNaija S6, other top searches on Google trends - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Google on Thursday said the European Premier League results, how to vote on Big Brother Naija S6, and Afghanistan were the top searched on Google trends for the month of August.
articles.content:
Google on Thursday said the European Premier League results, how to vote on Big Brother Naija S6, and Afghanistan were the top searched on Google trends for the month of August.
Mr Taiwo Kola-Ogunla… [+1685 chars]
